channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: George Clooney Recalls the Time Frank Sinatra Yelled at Him
item.description: 🎶 Old Hollywood drama alert! George Clooney spills the tea on Frank Sinatra's epic tantrum! 🎤 #musicnews #hollywoodgossip

item.title: Zohran Mamdani Shares Message to Vote at PinkPantheress’ Tour Opener: ‘Our Time Has Come’
item.description: 🗳️🎶 Zohran Mamdani delivers a powerful call to action at PinkPantheress’ tour kick-off: It's our moment to shine! #Empowerment #MusicActivism

item.title: The American Analog Set Announce East Coast “Magic Hour” Tour Dates
item.description: 🌟 Let's chase the magic with The American Analog Set! ✨ Catch them on their East Coast tour soon! 🎶 #MagicHourTour

item.title: Geddy Lee Talks Rush Reunion Tour in New Interview: ‘I Needed to Make Some Music Again’
item.description: 🎸 Geddy Lee spills the beans on a potential Rush reunion tour! Who's ready to rock out with these legends again? 🤘🎶 #RushReunion

item.title: Bruce Springsteen Unearths Fabeled Electric Nebraska Sessions: Stream
item.description: 🎸🎶 Dive into the musical treasure trove with Bruce Springsteen's Electric Nebraska Sessions! Rock out to the unearthed gems. 🔥💥 #Springsteen #ElectricNebraska
